summary: Innovative Marketing leader with 11+ years of experience delivering exceptional marketing campaigns, content and collateral based on established and innovative strategies. Results-oriented and collaborative professional bringing expertise in brand management and social media engagement. Detail-oriented, attentive and decisive leader. Hardworking, performance-oriented professional offering proven expertise in project development, team supervision and campaign enhancement.

profile_positions.description:
- Paid advertising plan to increase website traffic
- Global digital strategy to grow brand, drive traffic to the website and generate conversions
- Paid advertising, A/B tests and landing pages
- Website & Content calendar management and implementation
- Develop online marketing materials & training and make recommendations on marketing tactics 
- Monitoring and evaluation of digital presence and results
- Lead a growing team of marketing generalists
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Strategist

profile_positions.description:
- Led the development and execution of comprehensive content strategies for the client social media channels, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and objectives.
- Implemented best practices in SEO to optimize digital channels and drive increased visibility, engagement, and membership acquisition.
- Monitored and analyzed key performance indicators (KPIs) daily, leveraging insights to make data-driven decisions and continuously improve social media performance.
- Produced regular reports and presentations highlighting KPI trends, campaign results, and actionable recommendations for enhancing social media effectiveness.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including member support, PR and marketing, to align social media efforts with overall business goals and enhance the customer experience.
- Stayed up-to-date with industry trends and emerging digital marketing strategies to identify opportunities for innovation and growth.
- Maintained effective communication channels with stakeholders, ensuring timely and accurate dissemination of information and fostering strong working relationships.

At icamefromtheocean, we deliver waves of engagement to organizations willing to grow their database, and improve their content and digital strategies. 

Current and past clients: Greenpeace UK, Greenpeace Nordics, Greenpeace Africa and Greenpeace International.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Strategist & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Accountable for generating and delivering all content materials for alt.bank's social media channels in Brazil, ensuring adherence to brand guidelines and obtaining necessary approvals.
- Utilize industry-leading SEO practices to optimize digital channels and drive increased engagement and membership acquisition.
- Conduct daily monitoring of key performance indicators (KPIs), closely tracking metrics and analyzing data to inform decision-making and optimize social media strategies.
- Prepare monthly reports based on key KPIs, providing comprehensive insights and recommendations to enhance performance and achieve targets.
- Regularly communicate findings and updates to the member support team, fostering collaboration and alignment between departments.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Led the global digital communications strategy for the 30x30 campaign, driving awareness and engagement in marine protection initiatives.
- Developed and executed comprehensive advocacy communications plans, utilizing traditional media, social media, podcasts, and partner websites.
- Supported media relations, and press escort journalists, resulting in increased coverage of campaign priorities and grantee efforts.
- Collaborated with Greenpeace global staff to ensure cohesive messaging and coordinated efforts.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Communications Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Spearheaded the development and execution of global engagement strategies for the Oil International project, ensuring successful implementation across multiple offices.
- Conducted monthly analysis of key insights using tools such as Facebook Insights, Instagram Insights, Socialbakers, and Google Analytics, delivering comprehensive reports to directors and stakeholders to drive data-informed decision-making.
- Built relationships with customers and the community to promote long-term business growth.
Successfully implemented Influencer Marketing initiatives, resulting in a significant increase of up to 60% in petition traffic and 17,5% engagement rate.
- Cultivated and maintained strategic partnerships with National and Regional Offices (NROs), fostering collaboration and alignment towards achieving global goals.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Oversaw Greenpeace Brazil's online editorial activities, managing the entire process from inception to publication.
- Led the coordination and approval process for editorial content involving national and international stakeholders.
- Assumed the Global Digital Lead position in 2014, focusing on global content strategies for acquisition and retention.
- Developed and implemented connected strategies between organic and paid content, collaborating closely with the communications and fundraising team.
- Designed and executed an Email Marketing Journey integrated with the CRM system, resulting in a 3.5% increase in donor retention compared to other campaigns.
- Conducted continuous research on political, economic, media, and social media trends to inform content strategies and campaign approaches.
- Established and nurtured partnerships with influential figures in the digital sphere to amplify campaign reach and impact.
- Collaborated with platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and various Google products to optimize campaign performance and engagement.
profile_positions.title: Storyteller and Digital Strategist

profile_positions.description:
- Managed and maintained social media profiles for high-profile clients including Sony Pictures Brazil, Disney Studios Brazil, Motorola Brazil, Cervejaria Nacional, and Liberty Seguros.
- Monitored and analyzed brand reputation and sentiment through buzz monitors, ensuring proactive management of online presence and effective response to customer feedback.
- Developed and executed comprehensive editorial plans, curating engaging and relevant content to drive audience engagement and brand visibility.
- Produced reports on return on investment (ROI) and brand awareness, providing valuable insights and actionable recommendations to support research and sales teams.
- Collaborated closely with internal stakeholders and client teams to align social media strategies with overall business objectives and ensure consistent brand messaging.
- Stayed updated on industry trends and emerging social media platforms, implementing innovative approaches to enhance client campaigns and maximize audience reach.
- Fostered strong client relationships, serving as a trusted advisor and delivering exceptional service to meet client expectations and achieve business goals.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Developed and curated engaging content for social media platforms of renowned brands including Absolut Vodka, Passport Scotch, and Cervejaria Nacional.
- Managed the creation, editing, and publishing of written, video, and photo content, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing materials.
- Attended events to capture live moments and produce real-time social media content, enhancing brand visibility and engagement.
- Maintained a unified brand voice and consistent messaging across different social media channels, ensuring a cohesive brand identity.
- Monitored and analyzed social media performance metrics, providing insights and recommendations to optimize content strategy and drive audience engagement.
- Stayed updated on industry trends and emerging social media platforms, implementing innovative approaches and tactics to enhance brand presence and reach.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: I played a crucial role in rescuing dogs affected by the mud flood. After ensuring they received appropriate veterinary care, I took responsibility for bathing and engaging in play activities with them, ensuring their well-being and providing them with much-needed love and attention.

As a member of an Anti-Oppression group, I actively participated in discussions and initiatives aimed at promoting inclusive and equitable practices on a global scale. Our focus was on fostering environments that did not perpetuate any form of oppression among diverse groups and individuals. Through engaging conversations, we explored topics such as feminism, anti-racism, anti-homophobia, the challenges faced by frontline communities, intersectionality, and more. By actively participating in these discussions, I contributed to the collective effort of creating a more inclusive and just society.

As part of the River Otter Ecology Project, I played a key role in managing their Instagram profile. I curated and created content including images, videos, and texts, ensuring a consistent and engaging content calendar. Additionally, I was responsible for posting content and managing the community interactions on the platform.
